name: Fulbright Foreign Student Program
eligibility: Open to international students with strong academic record and leadership potential.

name: Chevening Scholarship
organization: UK Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
eligibility: Applicants must hold an undergraduate degree and two years of work experience.

name: DAAD Development-Related Postgraduate Courses
eligibility: Open to graduates from developing countries with two years of professional experience.

name: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree Scholarship
eligibility: Students worldwide with an excellent academic record may apply.

name: Australian Awards Scholarship
organization: Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade (DFAT)
eligibility: Open to citizens of eligible developing countries in Asia and the Pacific.

name: Knight-Hennessy Scholars Program
amount: Full Funding for up to 3 years
eligibility: Students applying for graduate study at Stanford with strong leadership and civic mindset.

name: MEXT Japanese Government Scholarship
organization: Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT)
eligibility: Applicants must be from partner countries and meet academic merit criteria.

name: Rhodes Scholarship
eligibility: Exceptional students under 25 demonstrating leadership and academic excellence.

name: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
eligibility: Non-UK citizens applying for a full-time postgraduate degree at Cambridge.

name: Swiss Government Excellence Scholarships
eligibility: Open to international researchers and artists with outstanding academic backgrounds.
